resources.string:
RTP = Real-Time PersonalizationTM 
RTP is as easy as 1, 2, 3â€¦ 
1) Choose whether you want to use a sample file or your own file. 
If you want to use your own file, you will be able to select from a list of files stored in your Sequencing.com account.

2) Wait a moment for the list of files to appear and then select a file. This app's Real-Time PersonalizationTM will then be powered by the genetic data in the file you select.

3) Press continue.

Your Sequencing.com account doesn\'t appear to have any genetic data. Please go to the Upload Center at Sequencing.com to upload your genetic data. You\'ll then be able to connect this app with your genetic data. Until then, please use one of the following sample files
Please, provide a valid email address!
A confirmation email was just sent from AncestryDNA to your email address:
The email will be titled "Your request to download AncestryDNA raw data"

Please check your email and following the instructions below. 
 1. Open the email from AncestryDNA 
 2. Right click on the "Confirm Data Download" button in the email 
 3. Select "Copy Link" 
 4. Return to this screen and paste the link below. 
 Alternatively, you may also click the "Confirm Data Download" button in the email, which will open your internet browser. Copy the entire URL that appears in your browser and then paste it in the field below. The URL will look like this: https://www.ancestry.com/dna/rawDownload/a-long-number-will-appear-here"
Please check your email, copy and paste a received confirmation link in the field below:
Your Ancestry.com data is being securely imported into your Sequencing.com account. It will be available within 20 minutes for you to use with apps in the App Market.
